title: New Contact Information
snippet: OverviewDue to some privacy issues with having my email available to the general public, I’ve decided to change my main contact method to a Message on Cemetech. This means that when you click on the mail icon in the sidebar, rather than redirecting to my email, you will get a link to sending me a...

title: How to Rip Sprites From Jetpack Joyride
snippet: IntroductionRecently, I was interested in ripping sprites from Halfbrick Studios’ popular game Jetpack Joyride. I downloaded the APK file and extracted it, but instead of finding a viewable image such as a PNG, I only found texture files with the extension .tex. At first I thought it might be an ...
